content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Processing Facility at Position (-14.5, -48.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) extracting iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) storing extracted iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) transferring items from the chest to the furnace.

### Coal Processing Facility at Position (41.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) extracting coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing extracted coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) transferring items from the chest to the furnace.

### Additional Furnaces
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0) for additional smelting capacity.
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0) for additional smelting capacity.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors due to Inventory Management
- Ensure that there is sufficient iron ore in your inventory before attempting to insert it into a furnace. This will prevent errors related to insufficient resources.

### Errors with Full Chests
- Regularly check and empty chests that are full to ensure continuous operation of mining drills. Full chests will halt the mining process.

### Errors with No Ingredients to Smelt
- Ensure that furnaces have the necessary ingredients to smelt to avoid idle time and warnings about no ingredients to smelt.
